synopsis:
Hajime Nagumo and his high school class are suddenly summoned to a fantastical land as heroes. But while most of his classmates have powerful stats and abilities, Hajime does not. Underappreciated and unprepared, he tumbles into the depths of a monster-infested dungeon where voracity and sacrifice are his only options. To thrive in this savage world, heâ€™ll have no choice but to welcome the abyss.

(Source: Funimation)

title.en: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
